overview:
Matt Muro is the founder and CEO of LifeKnot.com

Matt Muro founded lifeknot in 2003 as an alternative to dating sites that focus on personality profiles. Mr. Muro also works for Harvard University as a Web Developer/Administrator for the Division of Continuing Education. Prior to joining Harvard University in 1998, Mr. Muro worked as a Systems Engineer for Electronic Data Systems (EDS), largely in a technical programming and consulting capacity for various accounts in the Northeast. Mr. Muro holds a Bachelor of Science in Business Administration/Marketing from Marist College.
